itunes:title: Bonus Episode: SRT’s 10th Birthday Partnership with illumiNations
title: Bonus Episode: SRT’s 10th Birthday Partnership with illumiNations
description:
Listen in as Amanda and Raechel talk with Emily Vogeltanz from illumiNations in this week’s bonus podcast episode!


There are more than 1 billion people around the world with little or no access to Scripture. But now, thanks to illumiNations, we have the opportunity to help end Bible poverty by 2033. To celebrate 10 years of reading God's Word together as the She Reads Truth community, we're joining the movement to get Scripture translated into every language, for every person, on earth!

Will you join us? Visit 12vc.com/SheReadsTruth to be part of the movement.

See this episode's show notes at shereadstruth.com/podcast/bonus-episode-srts-10th-birthday-partnership-with-illuminations.
